snippet.title: Sega Saturn Longplay - "Minnesota Fats: Pool Legend"
snippet.description:
Game Title: "Minnesota Fats: Pool Legend"
Developer: Data East
Publisher: Data East USA
Release Date: 1995

So, I found this game at work, while doing video captures of Sega Saturn games, and was immediately entertained by the idea that the story mode in a pool game would be told through live-action cutscenes. When I did some research on it after the fact, I found that information on this game was virtually nonexistent. There were no walkthroughs, no emulations, no longplays, nothing.

I felt that this game and this story were too good to let history pass them by, so I recorded the story mode in its entirety during my free time. And it was even better than I expected.
